amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to implement a searchable public consumer safety database which is described in the Consumer Product Safety Act of 2008.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 545 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to carry out any of the activities described in section 6A of the Consumer Product Safety Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pompeo amendment (A149) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 187 (Roll no. 137).
